author: claireloughran12
title: Nice quiet hotel with fantastic location. - Review
text:
Our room was basic but clean and very comfortable, which is what we wanted seeing as we had a very busy plan for our holiday in Paris, we only wanted a place to leave our bags, shower and sleep, and this hotel was perfect for us.
The hotel is literally located at the foot of the Eiffel Tower, the entrance to the ticket lines only being a 2-3 minute walk away. Just around the corner from the hotel are some nice restaurants and a supermarket.
Metro station is just a few minutes away which was very convenient. And there is a bus stop which for CDG and Orly airports directly outside the hotel.
All staff were lovely and we had no problems with check in or out, and were happy to help with any questions we had.
